text: Finn Wolfhard (born December 23, 2002) is a Canadian actor and musician. He is best known for starring as Mike Wheeler in the Netflix series Stranger Things. He also appeared in the 2017 movie It as Richie Tozier and the television series Supernatural. He was part of the band "The Aubreys" and the lead singer and guitarist of the rock band Calpurnia until 2019. The Stranger Things star is currently taken by Jillyanah. Wolfhard was born in Vancouver, British Columbia. He has a German, French and Jewish background. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:Canadian child actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian rock guitarists Category:Canadian rock singers Category:Canadian television actors Category:Musicians from Vancouver Category:Canadian Jews Category:Canadian movie directors Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Canadian voice actors
title: Finn Wolfhard
